segments.text: But you should be considerate to the kids , it ’ s their nature to play .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What I cannot put up with is that they may even give me a back talk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , it ’ s not polite of them , but sometimes you should put things the other way round and try to understand them .
segments.speaker: S1
